comment: Unfortunately it is not possible to change the volume. Pressing the speaker buttons has no effect. However, this app is still a convenient way to play and pause.
title: Volume buttons not working

author: Steve Boulanger
comment: Don't waste your money. It doesn't work at all and the developer has no servive. This app should be removed for the Google store big time. I cannot get a refund. I guess I lost my money.
title: Doesn't

author: Andreas Gerdes
comment: Whatever you do, don't download this, it does not work . Plex supports smartwatches automatically
title: Does not work
